1232311.content:
“Uggh. Boredom. The one feeling you try to shake, but don't know how.” A female guilmon thought to herself as she made her way to the nearest forest.

As she was walking, an odd berry fell from the tree above her. Bouncing off her head.

“Oof, what the,?” She exclaimed, “Where did that come from?” She focused her attention on the fruit that had fallen onto her head. It was round and shapely like an orange, but a deep blue in color unlike one.

She held it up to her nose and took a deep whiff. It smelt of vanilla. “Hm, interesting.” she thought. Her curiousity peaked, she took a bite. It tasted like mint. “Pleh. Ugh. Not what I was expecting.” She said, spitting the fruit out. Strangely, the taste of mint did not last long, changing into a tart, strawberry esque taste. “Ok, that's better.” She said, taking the new taste in.

As the taste began to disapate, the back of her throat began to tingle. It sent a shiver down her spine. “Oh,” she said in a slightly aroused tone “,What was that?” She finished, raising her hand to her head, resting her black nailed fingers on her forehead.

Wait, she didn't have any fingers, just paws. She jolted her hands into her field of view.”AH!” she yelled, falling onto her backside. Her new fingers were long and slender, like a human females. It took her a little while to take in the situation. Suddenly feeling the tingle again although it focused on her head and below. Feeling the base of her head with the hand she wasn't inspecting and realized her neck had elongated a couple of inches if not more. It wasn't only on her hands and neck now, her legs, feet and arms were starting to grow longer and bigger too.

How does she react?
1232311.title: Berries?

choices: Peels it to lick at the juices
12323111.content:
The panic began to set in. “Ah, oh my god, what is happening to me? Why am I changing? I'm not supposed to change like this!” She rambled.

Her arms and legs began to widen, adding extra girth as support to her newly lengthened appendages, her waist curving in a feminine manner and being complemented by wide, womanly hips accentuated by thick, fatty thighs.

The female Guilmons panicked gaze fell to her chest, where two breasts began to form. They were only C cup at the moment but we're continuing to grow.

The female Guilmon was just standing in shock, the only thing fighting back her arousal being true terror.

Finally the tingling had stopped. Having grown five feet taller, she now stood at ten and a half feet tall. Her new breasts have expanded exponentially, being extremely soft and bouncy EE cups. And when I say bouncy, I mean just her breathing gave them a good shake. Her rump was not spared from the transformation, being 25% larger, five times as firm, and twice as bouncy compared to her breasts.

The female guilmon sat up against a tree, waiting for the panic to die down. But once it did. She looked up at the tree the fruit had come from, only to find that it wasn't there, in fact, there weren't any trees anymore. “Wait what?!?” She boomed. “Where did it do?!? How did it go?!? And why did it's fruit do this to me?!?” She looked down to see the trees, now at eye level with her. “Oh.” She said, feeling dumb.

Being the curious type, she takes another fruit and…

info.brief_description: the two best 'Mon' franchises, and their anthro's come together to grow for your pleasure.
info.description:
DA RULES:

1.Grammar. Try and make it presentable.
2.Plot. Try and make it clear where the story is going.
3.Keep it consistent. make sure that you know everything about the story you're adding to before jumping in.
4.no scat, toilet humour, foot fetish or any other weird things.
5.always leave room for another pokemon or digimon with the term 'other' when introducing the one you are using, so people can always pick something else if they don't like yours.
7.Last one, expansion is part of the plot in every case, and any expansions are permanent, so choose wisely.

apart from those, just have fun!
